title: Pr1 2

jeff the 3816

it's good but that face lmao

[[collapsible show="SCP-CN-384" hide="tfw wrong about something... Dang!"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/v8JcpHIm.png width="300px"]]
This was kind of a test on realistic skin tone and how it would look on my simplistic characters. I think it looks ok but most of my art will still be bleach white because my characters are kind of a blank slate in a way. That's why the SCP has skin color but the other guy got that white stuff.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="The stealing of a name (Taboo animation)" hide="headcanon time"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/fAlyE1g.gif width="300px"]]
god, this was so fun to do, and if you are reading this, i love how you still frequent this page, you are an awesome person. seriously it drives me crazy whenever i post something... and it just gets ignored or downvoted. it makes me so sad but i try my hardest omg.

sorry for venting.

Also if it isn't obvious, click for the gif to move.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP-427" hide="ess see pee containment breeech"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/H5lNwppm.png width="300px"]]

[[/collapsible]]
